mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rstrnt_id) AS rstrntCount FROM RSTRNT WHERE DEL_YN ='N'
SELECT B.RSTRNT_SE_CD , A.RSTRNT_SE_NM , COUNT(*) AS rstrntCntBySe FROM RSTRNT_SE A JOIN RSTRNT B ON A.RSTRNT_SE_CD = B.RSTRNT_SE_CD GROUP BY B.RSTRNT_SE_CD, A.RSTRNT_SE_NM
SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_NO) AS reviewCnt FROM REVIEW WHERE PLACE_ID LIKE 'RST%'

SELECT R.RSTRNT_ID, R.RSTRNT_SE_CD, R.FRST_WRTER_ID, R.FRST_WRTER_TM, R.LA, R.LO, R.RSTRNT_NM, R.RSTRNT_IMG, R.RSTRNT_TEL, R.RSTRNT_ADRES, R.BSN_HOUR, R.RSTRNT_URL, R.DEL_YN, R.RESTDE, R.BREAK_TM, R.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, R.LAST_UPDT_TM, RV.REVIEW_CNT FROM RSTRNT R JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(PLACE_ID) AS REVIEW_CNT, PLACE_ID FROM REVIEW WHERE PLACE_ID LIKE 'RST%' GROUP BY PLACE_ID ORDER BY COUNT(PLACE_ID) DESC ) RV ON R.RSTRNT_ID = RV.PLACE_ID WHERE R.RSTRNT_ID IN ( SELECT RSTRNT_ID FROM ( SELECT RSTRNT_ID FROM RSTRNT WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ) ) ORDER BY RV.REVIEW_CNT DESC
SELECT M.SEX_DSTN, COUNT(*) AS reviewCnt FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.FRST_WRTER_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE R.PLACE_ID = #{value} GROUP BY M.SEX_DSTN
SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN SEX_DSTN = '남' THEN 1 END) AS maleCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN sex_dstn = '여' THEN 1 END) AS femaleCnt FROM MEMBER

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS teenagers, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS twenties, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thirties, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS forties, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fifties, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sixties, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 70 AND 79 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS seventies, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 80 AND 89 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eighties, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 1, 4)) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEM_BRTHDY, 1, 4)) BETWEEN 90 AND 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS nineties FROM MEMBER

SELECT A.SCHAND_SE_CD AS CATEGORY, COUNT(*) AS PRODUCT_COUNT, B.SCHAND_SE_NM FROM SCNDHD_BBS A JOIN SCNDHD_SE B ON A.SCHAND_SE_CD = B.SCHAND_SE_CD WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND NTSL_STTS = '판매중' GROUP BY A.SCHAND_SE_CD, B.SCHAND_SE_NM

SELECT COUNT(PST_ID) AS cateCnt FROM SCNDHD_BBS
WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND PST_ID LIKE 'SCN%'

SELECT A.schand_se_cd, A.registered_quantity, A.SCHAND_SE_NM FROM ( SELECT A.schand_se_cd , COUNT(A.schand_se_cd) AS registered_quantity, B.SCHAND_SE_NM FROM scndhd_bbs A INNER JOIN SCNDHD_SE B ON A.SCHAND_SE_CD = B.SCHAND_SE_CD WHERE TO_DATE(fsrt_writing_tm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '1' MONTH GROUP BY A.schand_se_cd, B.SCHAND_SE_NM ORDER BY COUNT(schand_se_cd) DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM < = 10

SELECT SUM(registered_quantity) AS total_registered_quantity FROM ( SELECT schand_se_cd , COUNT(schand_se_cd) AS registered_quantity FROM scndhd_bbs WHERE TO_DATE(fsrt_writing_tm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '1' MONTH GROUP BY schand_se_cd ORDER BY COUNT(schand_se_cd) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < = 10

SELECT pst_id, pst_sj, rdcnt FROM (SELECT pst_id, pst_sj, rdcnt, SUBSTR(fsrt_writing_tm, 0, 8) FROM scndhd_bbs WHERE SUBSTR(fsrt_writing_tm, 0, 8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY rdcnt DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
